channel.title: United X Scape
channel.description:
Servers features Npc Combat Improved 100% no LAGG! Perfect PVP Combat Minigames Monsters Skill masters GodWars Great economy Dark Bow Special 100% All skills work Farming Skill 100%! Donator benefits XP Rate is FAST Fun Gameplay - our main objective is to create a fun server with lots of skills to train
Good Combat [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/combatgreat.png[/img] Farming with growing timers - members only [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/farming.png[/img] Different places to train [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/apetoll.png[/img] Slayer tasks [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/slayertask.png[/img] Lots of ways to make money! [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/cash.png[/img] Donating [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/donator.png[/img] United X Scape [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/slayers.png[/img] Woodcutting with LumberJack [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/Woodcutting-1.png[/img] Mining Area [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/mines.png[/img] Shops scattered around home & skilling [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/shops-1.png[/img] 99 Leveling [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/99s.png[/img] Working skill point shop [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/skilling.png[/img] Underground mining [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/miningd.png[/img] Fisherman takes you to fishing area once talking to him [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/f9shing.png[/img] Fishing Area [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/fishc.png[/img] Login [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/starting.png[/img] Equipment interface [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/inter.png[/img] [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh95/zezina/equipment-3.png[/img]
